overview: A Christian icon for two thousand years and the Church’s most legendary sinner-turned-saint, Mary Magdalene’s underestimated role in Christianity is finally coming to light. With compelling evidence, this revealing program tackles the myths about the infamous and controversial Mary Magdalene. Questions are raised about Mary’s position in the early Christian movement, provoking some unexpected answers in this intriguing and momentous documentary.
title: Something About Mary Magdalene
